resume: Roommates and pals John Roth (Josh Hamilton  and Moe Curley  start an adult internet site named InterconX where Jordan Nash  is one of their stars. John has recently gone through a disastrous break-up with his fiancé, and is now obsessed with a woman named Angel, who lives her life on 24 hour webcam. A handful of people whose lives revolve around internet relationships at an adult web site become entangled in person in this comedy/drama.
